p:
Relative yield total was calculated as:
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$ \mathrm{R}\mathrm{Y}\mathrm{T}=\left(\mathrm{R}{\mathrm{Y}}_{\mathrm{ab}}+\mathrm{R}{\mathrm{Y}}_{\mathrm{ba}}\right)/2 $$\end{document}
R Y T =
R
Y ab
+ R
Y ba
/ 2
